title: KDP Niche Research - How to Find Low Content Book Niches on Amazon for FREE in 2021 (NO PAID TOOLS!)
description:

Just a quick video on KDP niche research in 2021. In this video I am taking a look at some free ways of finding a load of low content book publishing niches without having to use paid software, through Amazon and Amazon alone.

Which tools am I using?

DS AMAZON QUICKVIEW (chrome extension)
https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/ds-amazon-quick-view/jkompbllimaoekaogchhkmkdogpkhojg?hl=en

KEYWORDS EVERYWHERE (chrome extension)
https://keywordseverywhere.com/

These are the only two bits of software I'd recommended using when it comes to finding good low content niches in 2021. Keyword research is important for finding niches that have money being spent in them
